item.title: localStorage Performance
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Steve Souders on measuring localStorage performance, specifically pre-caching in Firefox: A downside of Firefox’s precaching behavior would seem to be that all pages on the domain would suffer the penalty of reading localStorage regardless of whether they actually used it. Have I ever mentioned how every technical decision involves trade offs?
item.content:encoded:
Steve Souders on measuring localStorage performance, specifically pre-caching in Firefox:

A downside of Firefox’s precaching behavior would seem to be that all pages on the domain would suffer the penalty of reading localStorage regardless of whether they actually used it.

Have I ever mentioned how every technical decision involves trade offs?
